name: Roo.dd.Registry
desc:
Provides easy access to all drag drop components that are registered on a page.  Items can be retrieved either
directly by DOM node id, or by passing in the drag drop event that occurred and looking up the event target.

methods.name: getHandleFromEvent
methods.desc: Returns the handle that is registered for the DOM node that is the target of the event

methods.name: getTargetFromEvent
methods.desc: Returns a custom data object that is registered for the DOM node that is the target of the event

params.name: element
params.desc: The id or DOM node to register

params.name: data
params.desc:
(optional) A custom data object that will be passed between the elements that are involved in drag drop operations. You can populate this object with any arbitrary properties that your own code knows how to interpret, plus there are some specific properties known to the Registry that should be populated in the data object (if applicable): 
Value      Description

---------  ------------------------------------------

handles    Array of DOM nodes that trigger dragging

           for the element being registered

isHandle   True if the element passed in triggers

           dragging itself, else false

params.name: element
params.desc: The id or DOM node to unregister

methods.name: getHandle
methods.desc: Returns the handle registered for a DOM Node by id

params.name: id
params.desc: The DOM node or id to look up

methods.name: getTarget
methods.desc: Returns a custom data object that is registered for a DOM node by id

params.name: id
params.desc: The DOM node or id to look up
